Uh, Blondetron, Rex is in the Cybertronian Fire, and you can't exactly go 
there from the Destron base in one post.

::Shredder::

Shredder lets out a sigh of relief as Blodetron exits. He sits down on a 
chair, waiting for further word from his new ally.
